mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT B.*, row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY B."hihokenshaNo" ORDER BY B."idoYMD" DESC, B."edaNo" DESC ) AS rowNo FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" AS B) AS A WHERE A.rowNo = 1 AND A."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号}

SELECT A.* FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5002NinteiKekkaJoho" AS B ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = B."shinseishoKanriNo" AND A."rirekiNo" = B."rirekiNo" WHERE A."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND ((B."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD" <= #{世帯基準日} AND #{世帯基準日} < B."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD") OR A."rirekiNo" = '0000')
